missionParamId.Wiki: MissionParam row ID; mainly determines which map to fight on.

menuCategory.Wiki: Value determining which tab in the arena menu to use; can be set arbitrarily. Tab text FMG ID is 258010 + menuCategory in FNR_メニューテキスト.

accountParamId.Wiki: AccountParam row ID; opponent's name and emblem.

charaInitParamId.Wiki: CharaInitParam row ID; opponent's loadout and customization.

introCutsceneId.Wiki: Cutscene ID to play at the start of the mission.

bgmSoundId.Wiki: Background music to play during the mission.

rankTextureId.Wiki: Texture ID defined in the SB_ArenaRank layout.

outroCutsceneId.Wiki: Cutscene ID to play at the end of the mission.
